description: Test data for new patient booking in diary module.
preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.

testDataSets.description: Valid booking with all required fields
testDataSets.expectedResult: Booking is created and visible in the selected diary with Black 'A' icon.
Booking is NOT created. User is prompted to fill required fields.

testDataSets.description: Booking with appointment time at boundary (start of day)
testDataSets.expectedResult: Booking is created at the earliest slot.

testDataSets.description: Booking with appointment time at boundary (end of day)
testDataSets.expectedResult: Booking is created at the latest slot.

postconditions: A booking should be made if required information was filled in and saved.
If the user closes the screen or not all required fields are filled in, NO booking should be made.
